div.p: This case-sensitive code system https://eyematics.org/fhir/eyematics-kds/CodeSystem/vs-va-correction-methods defines the following codes:

tr.td: Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values obtained from an autorefractor.
Trial Lenses - Values from Manifest Refraction without Cycloplegia
Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values from manifest refraction without cycloplegia.
Trial Lenses - Values from Manifest Refraction with Cycloplegia
Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values from manifest refraction with cycloplegia.
Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values from retinoscopy.
Trial Lenses - Values of Unspecified Origin
Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing where the origin of the refractive values is unspecified.

description.value: Correction Methods not covered by snomed

definition.value: Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values obtained from an autorefractor.

display.value: Trial Lenses - Values from Manifest Refraction without Cycloplegia

definition.value: Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values from manifest refraction without cycloplegia.

display.value: Trial Lenses - Values from Manifest Refraction with Cycloplegia

definition.value: Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values from manifest refraction with cycloplegia.
Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing based on values from retinoscopy.

display.value: Trial Lenses - Values of Unspecified Origin

definition.value: Trial lenses used for visual acuity testing where the origin of the refractive values is unspecified.
